Got this to work :D
How to install without misteamprep:
Extract Patch
Open the base content folder
extract each GCF file in the Patch folder (overwrite if asked to)
After you are done make a shortcut of hl2.exe
go to proprieties
at the target type:
-steam -garrysmod -appid 4001
And rename the shortcut
Garry's mod 11
EXACTLY LIKE THAT OR IT WONT WORK!
